Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
CAN: The student can draw two students holding cups with a string connecting them (basic concept of a string telephone).
The student can label the cups and the string partially (may label only the cups or string inconsistently).
The student can attempt to show that sound travels through the string (e.g., drawing sound waves inconsistently).
CANNOT: The student may not illustrate clearly how sound travels through the string (sound waves might be missing or misunderstood).
The student may not label all the key parts clearly (such as missing labels for 'string' or labeling errors).
The student may not effectively show that this device is a solution for communication over a distance (lacks explanation or context).
The student might not fully demonstrate how the device functions without modern technology (misunderstood purpose or incomplete depiction).
